story.author: Koolie Aid

chapter.chdesc: %msgr_nick% wants to talk to you December 22

msg.content: Got any plans for Christmas's Eve? â˜º

reply.content: I'm going to spend some time with my family ðŸ˜‰

typo.concat: want to spend some time with you ðŸ˜ðŸ˜

msg.content: I'm going to spend some time with my family.
Wanna hang out at new year?
Let's meet up at the park at 6PM ðŸ˜‰

reply.content: I wanted to prepare something special for you.

msg.content: Dude, just do it after we meet up ðŸ˜‚

reply.content: I've been waiting for 2 hours already ðŸ‘¿

msg.content: Oh, I'm very sorry. My boyfriend who will fetch me had some tire issues.
I feel safer with Mike. ðŸ˜‹

condition.then: SHOW_SNACK,0,Suddenly, you feel something inside you

chapter.chdesc: You talked to Mike after finding out that they were together.

typo.concat: . THE. HELL. You can't just trick somebody into going out with you. Aftern

msg.content: What? What do you mean? ðŸ˜•

reply.content: Remember Nicole? The one that got you busted?
She said that you're her boyfriend.

msg.content: You mean %msgr_fname%? Nah she already dumped me, and I have already moved on.
Besides, Jenny changed. She's a lot better now.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,You realized that Mike changed ,!SpLiT!,2000,So did everyone else

chapter.chdesc: At least that's what you think

msg.content: What? Today isnt my birthday ðŸ˜•

reply.content: Hey umm. Do you really have a boyfriend?
I was just wondering. Hope you don't get offended.
Well, yea I do. There's just something peculiar about your boyfriend.
Is it Mike Fisher? I talked to him and he said that he doesn't have a girlfriend.

msg.content: What? It's not Mike Fisher. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

reply.content: Really? You got me so hard ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

msg.content: I learned that Life is like a swing.

reply.content: Isn't that the quote I gave you?

msg.content: Really? I swear I remember saying that. ðŸ˜•
I think I said it in a park with somebody.
I don't really remember that somebody though.

condition.then: SHOW_SNACK,2,You realized that you have a chance.

msg.content: Can you like help me recall that somebody?

typo.concat: I don't really remember that much. I think it's been 5 years.

reply.content: Well...I do recall that he i
So...You wanna go out for some coffee?

msg.content: No thanks. I have to review for finals.
What did you put in there?
It's a book about psychology. Thanks ðŸ˜Š
It's a book about romance. ThanksðŸ˜Š

reply.content: That book costs a fortune ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

msg.content: Got any plans for haloween? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

reply.content: I'm going to watch horror movies ðŸ˜±ðŸ˜±

msg.content: Aren't you too old for that? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
Mike is going abroad with his family.

reply.content: Awww I won't be meeting him then.

msg.content: Wanna go out for some time?

condition.then: FADE_MSG,1,You went to a place with %msgr_nick%

msg.content: That was the best night I've ever had.
Koolie Aid won't finish this story
The so-called "gamer" is too lazy to update his story.

reply.content: I'm sure he has a lot of school work to do. I know for sure that he is an one-man army group and he made a whole presentation my himself. His teacher even insisted him to join some lame ass contest. You know what. Just shut up.

msg.content: Our teacher is giving us too many projects. ðŸ˜£ðŸ˜£ðŸ˜¥ðŸ˜¦
Got any time to hang out?
I'm really tired of all these projects.

reply.content: Let me check my schedule first ðŸ˜‹

msg.content: Great! I'll meet you at the park

condition.then: SHOW_SNACK,2,You saw Nic by the bridge

reply.content: Is that who I think it is?
Wow! You're not late like last time.

story.desc:
What if she remembered everything?
I created a discord server hope you guys join us https://discord.gg/AKW6nqb
Updates are slow Bc of my corrupted memory card. I can't save that fast, have to restart phone to save and upload.
A sequel to the story "Seen" by Polychroma Games.
Change log : Enabled skip chapter for you triggered folks Debugged chapter 1, other chapters aren't tested yet. Going to test them rn
That's a secret
Icon photoshoped by me Flower photographed by me Mike's pic is from Google
Nicole has different replies.
Not sure if updates are ruining my actions or my memory card is just corrupt
Author's notes: Too many projects at the moment. I have a background for chapter 7 and some new messages for it
This is one of the oldest stories here in Story World. I believe that this story is the 6th posted story.
